title: First Drafts (Extended Cut): Mother's Day Cards with Evie McGee Colbert
description:
The fabulous Evie McGee Colbert returns to The Late Show to help Stephen pick out the perfect Mother's Day card in this Late Show Pod Show exclusive extended cut. Happy Mother's Day everyone!
Great news — the Late Show Pod Show is now 7-days a week!
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
